notes.title: Author contributions
notes.p: W.X. and Z.L. conceived the research. W.X., Y.Z., J.W., and Z.L. designed the experiments. W.X. performed all experiments. Z.F., Z.W., Y.J., G.C., G.J., and D.L. helped with aerogel preparation, enzyamtic catalysis, strctural and activy assays. W.X., Y.Z., J.W., and Z.L. wrote the manuscript. All the authors discussed the results and commented on the manuscript.
